info.title: iotDpsClient
info.description: API for using the Azure IoT Hub Device Provisioning Service features.

get.description: List the operations for the provider
List all the provisioning services for a given subscription id.

post.description: List primary and secondary keys for a specific key name

parameters.name: keyName
parameters.description: Logical key name to get key-values for.

parameters.name: provisioningServiceName
parameters.description: Name of the provisioning service to retrieve.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The content of the action request

get.description: Get a list of all provisioning services in the given resource group.
Get the metadata of the provisioning service without SAS keys.

parameters.name: provisioningServiceName
parameters.description: Name of the provisioning service to retrieve.

put.description: Create or update the metadata of the provisioning service. The usual pattern to modify a property is to retrieve the provisioning service metadata and security metadata, and then combine them with the modified values in a new body to update the provisioning service.

parameters.name: provisioningServiceName
parameters.description: Name of the provisioning service to retrieve.

parameters.name: resource
parameters.description: Resource create parameters.

Retry-After.description: The Retry-After header can indicate how long the client should wait before polling the operation status.

patch.description: Update an existing provisioning service's tags. to update other fields use the CreateOrUpdate method

error.description: Error message containing code, description and details

code.description: One of a server-defined set of error codes.

details.description: An array of details about specific errors that led to this reported error.

IotDpsPropertiesDescription.description: the service specific properties of a provisioning service, including keys, linked iot hubs, current state, and system generated properties such as hostname and idScope

state.description: Current state of the provisioning service.

publicNetworkAccess.description: Whether requests from Public Network are allowed

privateEndpointConnections.description: Private endpoint connections created on this IotHub

provisioningState.description: The ARM provisioning state of the provisioning service.

iotHubs.description: List of IoT hubs associated with this provisioning service.

allocationPolicy.description: Allocation policy to be used by this provisioning service.

deviceProvisioningHostName.description: Device endpoint for this provisioning service.

idScope.description: Unique identifier of this provisioning service.

authorizationPolicies.description: List of authorization keys for a provisioning service.

enableDataResidency.description:
Optional.
Indicates if the DPS instance has Data Residency enabled, removing the cross geo-pair disaster recovery.

IotDpsSkuDefinition.description: Available SKUs of tier and units.

IotDpsSkuInfo.description: List of possible provisioning service SKUs.

tier.description: Pricing tier name of the provisioning service.

capacity.description: The number of units to provision

applyAllocationPolicy.description: flag for applying allocationPolicy or not for a given iot hub.

allocationWeight.description: weight to apply for a given iot h.

name.description: Host name of the IoT hub.

connectionString.description: Connection string of the IoT hub.

location.description: ARM region of the IoT hub.

filterName.description: The name of the IP filter rule.

action.description: The desired action for requests captured by this rule.

ipMask.description: A string that contains the IP address range in CIDR notation for the rule.

target.description: Target for requests captured by this rule.

nameAvailable.description: specifies if a name is available or not

reason.description: specifies the reason a name is unavailable

message.description: message containing a detailed reason name is unavailable
